entry.title: How I started a blog
entry.content:
As my first blog topic I want to cover how I decided to start my blog and what steps I used to get there.

There are a ton of different ways to start your own blog. I mean a ton. I decided that I want people to view my blog but I also want to host it for free also. I did some research and found that you can use GitHub <– to host your site for free. To get started visit the GitHub Pages website <–, follow the instructions and you will have a hosted website in no time.

After I hosted my site on GitHub I didn’t want to spend a whole lot of time designing and filling in the blanks so I decided to find a blogging theme to use to help speed up the process. This is where it can get a little confusing, so i’ll explain it in detail on how I got mine to work properly.

How I started a blog was originally published by Mason Hargrove at Mason's Blog on March 10, 2011.
